document.id: City of Tampa, Fla., Ord. No. 2020-71
document.heading:
AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF TAMPA, FLORIDA, RELATING T0 CONTESTING PARKING TICKETS; MAKING REVISIONS TO CITY OF TAMPA CODE OF ORDINANCES CHAPTER 15 (PARKING); ARENDING ARTICLE 11, REGULATIONS; PERMTS; PENALTIES, DIVISION 4, PENALTIES AND ENFORCERENT, SECTION 15-121, ISSUANCE OF PARKING TICKETS; PAYMENT OR CONTESTING TICKETS; PENALTIES FOR PARKING VIOLATIONS; REQUESTING A PARKING DIVISION REVIEW; REPEALING AIL
ORDINANCES OR PARTS OF ORDINANCES IN CONFLICT TREREWITH; PROVIDING FOR SEVERABILITY; PROVIDING AN EFFECTIVE DATE

citations.citation: City of Tampa, Fla., Ord. No. 2020-71
